review: Recently purchased the Fire TV stick and I am very disappointed.  While the features are great, especially being able to verbally call up movies, I have found that when movies play, the scenes shot at night or in dark rooms are virtually impossible to see.  I tried adjusting the TV's brightness and other controls to no avail.  I have a Roku player on my TV up front and I do not have that problem.  The TV I had the Fire Stick on was a Samsung 27" LED, and the TV with the Roku on it is a Samsung 37" LCD.  i am going to try another similar product and see if that makes a difference. .
